content:
I cleaned up #8885 (square and multiply for powering). It should be green in CI shortly.

Like Leo (DiCaprio) in Revenant, I am finding my way back from the start of this semester.

If I want to continue using Lean for my cryptography course, I need this and I would prefer to work off Mathlib instead of around it.
I think several maintainers have already been in favor of this (including Kyle just now, and me), so I'm going to delegate this now.
